00036 class KviWindow;
00037 class DccMarshal;

00039 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00040         #include "KviSSLMaster.h"

00044 class DccMarshalOutputContext
00045 {
00046         friend class DccMarshal;
00047 public:
00048         DccMarshalOutputContext(){};
00049         virtual ~DccMarshalOutputContext(){};
00050 protected:
00051         virtual KviWindow * dccMarshalOutputWindow() = 0;
00052         virtual const char * dccMarshalOutputContextString() = 0;
00053 };
00054 
00055 class DccMarshal : public QObject
00056 {
00057         Q_OBJECT
00058 public:
00059         DccMarshal(DccMarshalOutputContext * ctx);
00060         ~DccMarshal();
00061 protected:
00062         // DCC DESCRIPTOR
00063         QString                      m_szIp;                    // Dcc initiator ip address (the one that listens)
00064         QString                      m_szPort;                  // Dcc initiator port (the one that listens)
00065         // other info
00066         bool                         m_bIPv6;                   // Dcc mode
00067         kvi_u32_t                    m_uPort;                   // Dcc initiator port
00068         bool                         m_bOutgoing;               // true if WE have connected to the remote host (so m_szIp is the remote host ip)
00069         QString                      m_szSecondaryIp;           // Ip of the client that has connected to the remote host
00070         QString                      m_szSecondaryPort;         // Port of the client that has connected to the remote host
00071         // internals
00072         kvi_socket_t                 m_fd;        // socket
00073         QSocketNotifier            * m_pSn;
00074         bool                         m_bUseTimeout;
00075         QTimer                     * m_pTimeoutTimer;
00076 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00077         KviSSL                     * m_pSSL;
00078         bool                         m_bUseSSL;
00079 #endif
00080         DccMarshalOutputContext * m_pOutputContext;
00081 public:
00082         const QString & dccIp() const { return m_szIp; };
00083         const QString & dccPort() const { return m_szPort; };
00084         const QString & localIp() const { return m_bOutgoing ? m_szSecondaryIp : m_szIp; };
00085         const QString & localPort() const { return m_bOutgoing ? m_szSecondaryPort : m_szPort; };
00086         const QString & remoteIp() const { return m_bOutgoing ? m_szIp : m_szSecondaryIp; };
00087         const QString & remotePort() const { return m_bOutgoing ? m_szPort : m_szSecondaryPort; };
00088         KviError::Code dccListen(const QString &ip,const QString &port,bool bUseTimeout,bool bUseSSL = false);
00089         KviError::Code dccConnect(const char * ip,const char * port,bool bUseTimeout,bool bUseSSL = false);
00090         kvi_socket_t releaseSocket();
00091 #ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00092         KviSSL * releaseSSL();
00093 #endif
00094         void abort();
00095 private:
00096         void reset();
00097 //#ifdef COMPILE_SSL_SUPPORT
00098 //      bool trySSLCertificate();
00099 //#endif
00100 private slots:
00101         void doSSLHandshake(int);
00102 //      void doListenSSLHandshake();
00103         void snActivated(int);
00104         void connectionTimedOut();
00105         void doListen();
00106         void doConnect();
00107 signals:
00108         void startingSSLHandshake();
00109         void sslError(const char * msg);
00110         void connected();
00111         void inProgress();
00112         void error(KviError::Code);
00113 };
